metadata.title: CVE-2016-15039 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability classified as critical was found in mhuertos phpLDAPadminup to 665dbc2690ebeb5392d38f1fece0a654225a0b38. Affected by thisvulnerability is the function makeHttpRequest of the filehtdocs/js/ajax_functions.js. The manipulation leads to http requestsmuggling. The attack can be launched remotely. This product does not useversioning. This is why information about affected and unaffected releasesare unavailable. The patch is nameddd6e9583a2eb2ca085583765e8a63df5904cb036. It is recommended to apply apatch to fix this issue. The associated identifier of this vulnerability isVDB-270523.

criterions.comment: phpldapadmin package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
